Uses of Class
com.staples.puzzle.bean.StaplesReportBean

  • Packages that use StaplesReportBean 
    Package Description
    com.staples.puzzle.processor  
    com.staples.puzzle.resource  

    • Uses of StaplesReportBean in com.staples.puzzle.processor

      Methods in com.staples.puzzle.processor that return StaplesReportBean 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StaplesReportBean StaplesAnalyticsProcessor.getAnalyticsReport(java.lang.String reportType)
      This method generates the final analytics report based on the reportType requested in the input a) Retrieve Staples and Merchant Order data as OrderDataBean b) Merge the OrderDataBeans to form the OrderBean c) Push all the OrderBeans into an ArrayList d) Sort the OrderBeans based on the requested reportType (1) session-type-desc - sort by session_type descending (2) order-id-asc - sort by order_id ascending (3) unit-price-dollars-asc - sort by unit_price_dollars ascending e) Meanwhile calculate Staples and Merchant SummaryDataBean f) Create an instance of StaplesReportBean with summary and details of all Staples and Merchant Orders
      StaplesReportBean IStaplesAnalyticsProcessor.getAnalyticsReport(java.lang.String reportType)
      This method executes the business logic to gather all the Order information to generate the final analytics report.

    • Uses of StaplesReportBean in com.staples.puzzle.resource

      Methods in com.staples.puzzle.resource that return StaplesReportBean 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StaplesReportBean StaplesAnalyticsResource.getAnalyticsReport(java.lang.String orderBy)
      Main resource method to process the HTTP-GET requests for the below URI patterns a) /report?order_by=session-type-desc b) /report?order_by=order-id-asc c) /report?order_by=unit-price-dollars-asc
